description: This file defines the app's theme for a Flutter application, including colors, text styles using Google Fonts, and theming for various UI components such as AppBar, Card, NavigationBar, ElevatedButton, and Chip.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: A class encapsulating primary, secondary, and accent colors used throughout the app.

methods.name: buildAppTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a ThemeData object configured with custom colors, typography, and component themes for the app.
